info.brief_description: A teenaged geek girl gets revenge for everything she's been put through.
info.description:
Let's meet our characters!: A 16 year old geeky girl with naturally loose curled light brown hair, pale skin, and chocolate brown eyes, named Anna. She is very thin, on the verge of grotesquely so. She wears black rectangular glasses for her vision and typically dresses in denim skinny jeans and t-shirts with hooded sweatshirts over them. She is only 5 feet tall and has an evil and downright cruel side that she keeps locked away but yearns to release. She hates Darian because Darian bullies her, but also secretly lusts after Darian and has fantasies where she brutally tortures her.

A 17 year old popular girl with black hair, olive skin, and chocolate brown eyes named Darian. She has an athletically slim body, is 5'5 and has C-cups. She's very mean to geeks and doesn't care how she hurts people. She typically dresses in jeans and hoodies as well.

Willing to go with any fetish except age regression and weight gain diapers on their own (for humiliation or otherwise) are okay. Having someone who was large to begin with being introduced to help torture is okay as well.

Yes, I am desperate. In order to be given said gift points, it must be a useful contribution. DO NOT do something stupid like type two words or a sentence and expect to be given points. DO contribute at least on relevant paragraph. Offer stands until my amount of Gift Points are completely depleted. I will make it known when this offer has been made void. Thank you.]
